article_title: CCC holds pinning ceremony: Nursing students graduate

article_metadata.description: Corning Community College nursing students celebrated the college's 50th pinning ceremony Thursday evening at First Arena in Elmira.
article_metadata.author: Amber Brenza abrenza@the-leader.com

og.description: Corning Community College nursing students celebrated the college's 50th pinning ceremony Thursday evening at First Arena in Elmira.
